name: The Adventures of DO-KNO
description:
The Adventures of Do-Kno is a Platformer where you can't jump! Instead you use bombs to launch yourself into the air, break boxes and even move platforms!

A special challenge awaits for those who are able to lead Do-Kno to the exit!

-controls -

space - place bomb;

arrows - move

space + down - place bomb in place

enter - pause, check controls and options
